notesStmt.note: Surface accretions, salt, mould, leather bloom, including liquid trickle patterns. Edge damage and tears, including possible red rot to repair patches. Paper fragments adhered to verso. Some pleats obscure text. Various stains, including damp, glue, candle wax. Surface abraded in part. Deliberate delamination and removal of surface. Many splits in sewing. Ink with white crust in places, partly flaked away.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Oriental square script of the 15th century.
